concept.title: Command Setups
concept.shortdesc: Commands can accept parameters. Parameters that change the behavior od the command are setups. Setups come after the command in blocks, indicated by square brackets.,

conbody.p: Setups come in two types: options and settings.
Options are single keywords. Commands that accept options can accept multiple options in an option block, separated by a comma.
Settings are key/value pairs. Commands that accept settings can accept multiple settings in a settings block, separated by a comma.
